summary: This is a December 16, 2020 letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to defense counsel in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, transmitting discovery materials including a UBS subpoena return. The letter references a protective order and designates the materials as confidential.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss

events.title: Discovery Production to Maxwell Defense
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office produces discovery materials, including a UBS subpoena return, to Ghislaine Maxwell's defense counsel.

events.title: Protective Order Issued
events.description: A protective order is issued in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, governing the confidentiality of discovery materials.

locations: 33 West 19th Street-4th Fl. New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office is producing discovery materials to Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team in her criminal case.
The production includes a UBS subpoena return dated December 15, 2020, indicating financial records are part of the discovery.
All materials are governed by a protective order dated July 31, 2020, and are designated as confidential.
The document shows the extensive legal team representing Ghislaine Maxwell, with attorneys from multiple law firms.
The letter is signed by Acting U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss, indicating the high-level government attention on the case.
